answers.answer: I have my placenta in the front and due to my diabetes I get a 3rd ultrasound weekly and her pictures come out (if she let's them get a picture).
I'm just scared that they will turn out blurry and not worth me paying 100$. Like I said I'm only 25 weeks

I've had 3d one done since 12 weeks and it's all up to the baby most of the time but the bigger the baby the less room they have to move! I get more clear shots of her face now that she can go swimming around.

I also have anterior placenta this pregnancy and last and mine turned iut amazing had them done twice with my daughter once at 12 weeks and once at 38 right before she was born thise were the best because she was so chunky:) they didnt have any issues getting shots.. also your placenta can move and usually does as you progress so you could always wait a bit of thats an option

question: Hello ladies. So I really wanna go n on Tuesday and have a 3d/4d us. But I have an anterior placenta and I'm afraid that if I pay all this money that it won't be worth it bc of this reason. I'm afraid raid it will get in the way and I won't get good pics of my sweet boy. Has anyone had an anterior placenta and attempted a 3d/4d us? How far along were you? Did they turn out okay? I'm 25 weeks today  if that helps
title: if you have/had an anterior placenta.... please answer
